Control Name: Protects Stored Items—Stored items are protected to prevent theft, corruption, destruction, or deterioration that would prevent output from meeting specifications.

control_attributes.Control: Protects Stored Items—Stored items are protected to prevent theft, corruption, destruction, or deterioration that would prevent output from meeting specifications.
control_attributes.SubCategory: PI1.5 The entity implements policies and procedures to store inputs, items in processing, and outputs completely, accurately, and timely in accordance with system specifications to meet the entity’s objectives.
